'''Ascension Phase''' refers to the number of times a [[Character]] or [[Weapon]] has been Ascended, which determines their maximum [[Level]]. The player must reach the required [[Adventure Rank]] to unlock the next Ascension Phase. The maximum Ascension Phase is 6 for a level of 90.

==Characters==
{{Main|Character}}
Characters require [[Character Level-Up Material|Level-Up Materials]], [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material|Enhancement Materials]], and [[Local Specialties]] to ascend.

Increasing a character's Ascension Phase unlocks new [[Passive Talent]]s, increases maximum level of [[Combat Talent]]s, and unlock new [[Character Stories]] and [[Voice-Over]]s in their Profile.

==Weapons==
{{Main|Weapon}}
Weapons require [[Weapon Ascension Material|Ascension]] and [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material|Enhancement Materials]] to ascend.
